description:
Pegasus’s hired duelist Player Killer cheats Mai of all her Star Chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back.  But when Player Killer’s Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Licht am Ende des Tunnels
La lumière au bout du tunnel
Pitch Black Duel! Castle of Dark Illusions
Shikkoku no Duel! Yami Kuramashi no Shiro
漆黒のデュエル! 闇晦ましの城
